caption:
This photograph captures a serene rural scene dominated by a landscape and real-estate signage. In the foreground, there is a 'SOLD' sign planted into the ground, bearing the name "Bodega Harbour" along with a graphical logo of a bird in flight. Perched atop the signpost is a small bird, seemingly observing its surroundings. The area around the sign is grassy and speckled with wildflowers and small shrubs.

Behind the sign, the landscape unfolds as a gently rolling hill with a few sparse trees or shrubs. The middle distance of the image reveals a series of utility poles strung with power lines, indicating some human development in the area.

The background features a large, tranquil body of water (likely a harbour or a bay) and overcast skies above further suggest a calm, moist environment typical of a coastal area. There is a very faint silhouette of a hill or low mountain in the far background, further shaping the tranquil and scenic location being depicted in this photograph. The overall mood conveyed is peaceful and pastoral, with a hint of residential or commercial development.
title: California--Point Arlina
